boardgame.name: Wiz-War
Wiz-War (eighth edition)
Wiz-War: Krieg der Magier
奪寶奇巫 Wiz-war (繁體版)
boardgame.description: Game description from the publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In Wiz-War, wizards wage no-spells-barred magical duels deep in an underground labyrinth. This classic board game of magical mayhem for 2-4 players, created by Tom Jolly in 1983, pits players' wizards against each other in a stupendous struggle for magical mastery. Win by stealing other wizards' treasures and hauling them back to your base, or just score points by blasting the other wizards. The last wizard standing always wins._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Staying true to the spirit of the game that has entertained players for years, as well inspiring an entire genre of games, this 2011 edition of Wiz-War caters to the imagination and the funny bone. Casting an enriched array of spells, your wizards race through an underground maze, avoiding fireballs, werewolves, and psychic storms. Subtle game enhancements by Kevin Wilson and Tom Jolly promote faster play and clarify card effects._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Re-implements:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Wiz-War_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Season 3: Episode #3 And Throw It In There
The Gaming Gang Episode 37: Mundus Novus, Giza, Franco-Prussian War 40, and Wiz-War

Fantasy Flight Games (FFG WIZ01) Apply your wiles to obfuscating opposing wizards in Wiz-War, the classic board game of magical mayhem for 2-4 players. Players assume the roles of mages in a subterranean maze, scheming to steal each other’s treasures. Cast spells to shapeshift, make doors, fireball foes, and more. Score points by stealing treasures from opposing wizards, or by eliminating the opposition. Last wizard standing always wins in this imaginative game of fantasy and fun.

Score points by stealing treasures from opposing wizards, or by eliminating the opposition. Last wizard standing always wins in this imaginative game of fantasy and fun.

Edition: Fantasy Flight Games (Eight Edition) Game has been opened and punched, but is unplayed. I bought this as part of a gaming club event that never came to fruition, and we just have way too many new games sitting around to be able to play all of them. Everything is complete and in pristine condition. I do not take PayPal as I no longer wish to utilize their services. Payment can be made by money order, check, or COD. COD option only available for those willing to pick the game up in Winter Park, FL. If you remit payment by a mailing option that can be tracked, I will send your game immediately upon receipt of valid tracking information; else, I will wait until payment clears to ship. Shipping will be by UPS Ground unless I am instructed otherwise.

Played only once. Everything is included and complete. Tokens have been baggied for your convenience. Game is in mint condition. Please note that I am out of town until July 28th. If you place the purchase before this date, I will ship the game out first thing the following Monday. Shipping will be by USPS Priority Mail Flat Rate Box unless specified otherwise by the buyer. If you live close to New Smyrna Beach, FL, you can elect not to pay shipping and simply pick it up from me instead.

Bought it and sleeved it with Mayday Sleeves from my FLGS. I was really excited to play, and barely got through the beginning and had to pack it up. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s been sitting and collecting dust on the shelf. I doubt I will have time to play it in the future and honestly, I have the print and play versions of this game already made so I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d rather pawn this one off. It comes from a smoke-free home, cards sleeved and minis unpainted. The tokens and chits have all been pre-punched. Everything is in very good condition. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m trying to sell this for about 25$ with 10$ shipping anywhere in the USA. I would sell it for 20$ but I will be including the sleeved cards as well. I hope that will be alright.

Fantasy Flight Games (FFGWIZ01) Wizards wage no-spells-barred magical duels deep in an underground labyrinth in Wiz-War. This classic board game of magical mayhem for 2-4 players pits players_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; wizards against each other in a stupendous struggle for magical mastery. Win by stealing other wizards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; treasures and hauling them back to your base, or just score points by blasting the other wizards. The last wizard standing always wins. Created by Tom Jolly in 1983, Wiz-War has delighted players for decades with its light tone and fast, imaginative play. Now Fantasy Flight Games brings Wiz-War back, better than ever! Staying true to the spirit of the game that has entertained players for years, as well inspiring an entire genre of games, Wiz-War caters to the imagination and the funny bone. Casting an enriched array of spells, your wizards race through an underground maze, avoiding fireballs, werewolves, and psychic storms. Subtle game enhancements by Kevin Wilson and Tom Jolly promote faster play and clarify card effects.

99% Complete : This copy is missing 2 Wizard Hat tokens (1 Green and 1 Red). There are still 3 of each left in the game and they are not necessary for playing the game anyway. The are only used to denote which wizard cast a persistent spell if there is a duplicate one on the board (like a magic wall).
